name: mini-linkedin-platform
description: Mini LinkedIn Community Platform - MERN Stack

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm run build"
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend
scripts.test: concurrently "cd backend && npm test" "cd frontend && npm test"
